name: Lost Saga NA
description: Part fighter, part brawler and made from pure awesomeness, Lost Saga is an action-packed beat-em-up styled game that will take your skills and push them to their max! Switch from over 60 heroes on the fly, letting you create an endless amount of combos!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.5GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 5600 or equivalent class DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Pentium 4 - 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6600 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
